item.title: Elizabeth Tsurkov, Princeton Student, Is Released From Iraq, Trump Says
item.description: Israel and Iraq confirmed the release of Elizabeth Tsurkov, a Russian-Israeli graduate student at Princeton who was kidnapped in Iraq in 2023 by the m...

item.title: Live Updates: Nepali Troops Move to Restore Order as Death Toll Rises to 22
item.description: Protesters defied a curfew to set fire to government buildings and the homes of politicians as unrest over censorship and economic issues continued.

item.title: Israel Targeted Hamas Leadership in Qatar Strike
item.description: The Gulf nation of Qatar has been trying to negotiate a cease-fire in the conflict. The attack threatened to destabilize those peace efforts.

item.title: Macron Picks Sébastien Lecornu as France’s Next Prime Minister
item.description: President Emmanuel Macron’s appointment of Sébastien Lecornu, the departing defense minister, after the government collapsed reflects the pressure Mr....

item.title: Explosive Protests in Nepal
item.description: Demonstrators have set fire to government buildings. The military has sent in troops to restore order.
